note: Disk constraints prevent full local clone. Run clone_command to pull all repos.
clone_command: cd orgs/blackroad-os && gh repo list BlackRoad-OS --limit 1000 --json name --jq '.[].name' | xargs -P4 -I{} gh repo clone BlackRoad-OS/{} orgs/blackroad-os/{} -- --depth=1
